alert.note: Alert for West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 2:06PM MST until January 11 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Rabbit Ears Pass. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Snow covered roads will make travel hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet
